attributes.action: Alcohol refreshments subsidies for all MPs and the House of Lords to be stopped.
attributes.additional_details:
There is evidence in the media that MPs drink too much, get inebriated and do not carry out their duties in a professional manner.  
This leads to bribery and corruption.  Loutish behaviour and sexist behaviour.  It must stop.
attributes.background: The country is in austerity and cutbacks are forced by Parliament because of debt.  Most people have had no salary increase for years, the exception being M Ps.  The people no longer wish their taxes to be spent on refreshments or alcohol.
